Protocol# BNNSOptimizer

iOS 14.0+iPadOS 14.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 11.0+visionOSwatchOS 7.0+tvOS 14.0+

```
protocol BNNSOptimizer
```

Deprecated

Use the BNNSGraph API instead.
